title: Define Project Scope and Features
description: Clearly define the scope of the task manager app and list all essential features. Consider user stories and use cases.

title: Choose Technology Stack
description: Select the appropriate programming language, framework, database, and other necessary technologies for the project. Consider factors like ease of use, scalability, and community support.

title: Set up Development Environment
description: Configure the development environment with all the required tools and libraries. Create a project repository (e.g., on GitHub) and set up version control.

title: Design Database Schema
description: Design the database schema to efficiently store task data, user information, and other relevant data. Consider relationships between tables and data types.

title: Implement User Authentication
description: Implement user registration, login, and authentication functionalities. Ensure secure password storage and user data protection.

title: Develop Task Creation Feature
description: Implement the functionality for users to create new tasks, including specifying title, description, due date, priority, and other relevant details.

title: Implement Task Listing and Filtering
description: Develop the functionality to display a list of tasks, with options to filter tasks based on criteria such as due date, priority, and status.

title: Develop Task Editing Feature
description: Implement the functionality for users to edit existing tasks, allowing them to modify details such as title, description, due date, and priority.

title: Implement Task Completion Feature
description: Implement the functionality for users to mark tasks as complete. Consider adding features such as task archiving or deletion.

title: Implement Due Date Reminders
description: Integrate a notification system to remind users of upcoming task due dates. Allow users to customize reminder settings.

title: Implement User Interface (UI)
description: Design and implement a user-friendly interface for the task manager app. Focus on usability and visual appeal.

title: Testing and Debugging
description: Thoroughly test the application to identify and fix bugs. Conduct unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance testing.

title: Documentation
description: Create documentation for the application, including user guides and technical documentation for developers.

title: Final Review and Polish
description: Conduct a final review of the application to ensure that it meets all requirements. Polish the UI and fix any remaining bugs.
